WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr3 won't work with the 4.x changes. This will not be fixed, sorry.Rawr4 coming soon (tm)
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
When I try to load my druid feral, everything go smooth, except the fact it remains heal spec. So when I try to force it to go Druid/Cat, it crash.
 
When, I first imput the spec, Druid/Cat, and than upload from armory it crash again with this message :
 
[Arg_NullReferenceException]
Arguments : 
Les chaînes de ressource de débogage ne sont pas disponibles. Souvent la clé et les arguments fournissent suffisamment d'informations pour diagnostiquer le problème. Consultez http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.50917.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_NullReferenceException
